verbs.description: it time for the annual starbucks cup controversy [V: do] the company new designs embrace christmas stars stripes flames and coffee cherries all adorned in cheerful shades of red and green these are the four designs included in starbucks latest batch of seasonally themed cups which will debut friday as the company kicks off the holiday season starbucks
